biocontainers.name: pypgatk
biocontainers.summary: The Pypgatk framework and library provides a set of tools to perform ProteoGenomics Analysis.

biotools.summary: pypgatk is a Python library part of the ProteoGenomics Analysis Toolkit. It provides different bioinformatics tools for proteogenomics data analysis

bioschemas.name: pypgatk
bioschemas.summary: pypgatk is a Python library part of the ProteoGenomics Analysis Toolkit. It provides different bioinformatics tools for proteogenomics data analysis
